entry.title: Cut and Run
entry.summary:
Author: Bubbling24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,183Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 50

Summary: In a city like Gotham, information is currency. And you've made a career out of getting people to talk.Not by force. Not with threats. Just a salon chair, a mirror, and the kind of silence that makes people fill it with secrets. Affairs. Deals. Who’s moving into which block. Who’s gone missing. Who’s about to.You’re not a vigilante. You don’t wear a mask. You just know when something’s about to crack - and lately, Gotham’s been humming like a live wire.And you weren’t supposed to matter. Not to anyone.And especially not to the man who just blew up a bar because you said it gave you a bad feeling.

entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,635Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 81

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all.What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway?In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel. Good thing he knows how to fuck.

entry.title: Anywhere and Everywhere
entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,830Chapters: 4/40Kudos: 22

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. Sometimes it comforted you knowing you would never truly be without him but sometimes it was very inconvenient. Like tonight, Scarecrow was planning on a mass release of his newest fear toxin, not to mention he was working with someone new on the Gotham crime scene but they seemed so very familiar.

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,350Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: What He Meant Was: I Love You
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,946Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: It wasn't exactly comfortable for either of them, because her knees were still pulled up to her chest, and Jason decided that wasn't good enough.He lightly wrapped his hand around her ankle, then tugged gently. She raised her head a little, looking completely confused, as he kept pulling until she had fully extended her legs to his other side. It was only when he started to pull her into his lap, intending to give her the proper hug that she deserved, that she seemed to realize what he was doing. She dropped her head and wrapped her arms around him as well, almost immediately leaning into him again, letting him take her weight.Jason didn't like it. He didn't like the way she buried her face in his neck - well, he did, but not right now - and cried for what seemed like the first time in a long time. He was used to seeing her be snarky, always quick with a comeback, not afraid to speak her mind. But right now, all he could feel was the way her body shook with near-silent tears, like even while she was having a completely understandable and valid breakdown, she didn't want to make herself seem like more of a burden than she had to.

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,825Chapters: 12/25Kudos: 162

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,772Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 196

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.
